Posts.Content: I went to fill my script tonight for my Arimidex and they stated to me that there is a generic for arimidex now, how wonderful is that! Just wondering if any one knew, i don't know the name yet, picking it up tomprrow. just thought i would share, big difference in price, i will get back when i find out or if anyone know's that would be great too. Katrina
Posts.Title: Generic for arimidex

Posts.Content: thanks for replying to this. I just picked my script up, and you are right, alot cheaper, my copay was 60.00 now 20.00, big difference. Big differnece also if no ins. reg. price for arimidex is 329.00 in the U.S. but i do not know the reg price for generic. Also Survivor8260 i was wondering how long you have been on this and if you have any side effects? Thanks, Katrina
Posts.Title: Generic for arimidex

Posts.Content: Hi, i am so glad to help. I did had the first biospy, and then had a lumpectomy, and then when they found more cancer behind the breast tissue i had a double mascetomy. I also had reconstructive surgery. But everyone scenario is different. My mother was diagnosed two years prior to me and her cancer was the kind that don't spread so she had a lumpectomy. She had to have radiation a  small amount of chemo, i did not have to have radiation because their was nother to radiate because i had it all removed, breast, breast tissue and nipples, so i had reconstruction, with implants. And my mother and i are both survivor's and you will too, so don't be scared, and please ask any question at anytime. god bless you!
Posts.Title: Re: breast cancer cell

Posts.Content: Hi, i will pray for you. You should take it day to day, try not to think awful thought's. You may have the cancer that don't spread and caught early. I had the good cancer that does not spread and the bad cancer. I went from stage o to stage 2 after my biopsy a small lump was found behind my breast tissue. And i always stayed very positive. There is a breast cancer line you can call 24 hrs. it is called why me i do not have the number off hand but i will try to find it for you. I would like you to keep in touch if you ever want to talk let me know. you can call me. My name is Kathy and i am a five year cancer suvivor, take care, and think positive, i do know how you feel and sometimes when you get scared, just think that this is only temporary, i was diagnosed in 05 and i named my cancer Katrina and i fought it like my inside was a hurrican. It sounds kind of crazy but it helped because i was going to beet it. take care!
Posts.Title: Re: breast cancer cell

Posts.Content: I am a five year survivor of breast cancer, double matsectomy, and i am wondering if anyone has a burning and a ache under armpit and surgery site. Not all the time but maybe 2 or 3 times a week this happens and it scares me. It would feel good to talk to someone about this issue please, Katrina49
Posts.Title: pathom pain, burning, acheness, underarm around surgery site

Posts.Content: I took Taxotere in 05, with stage 2 breast cancer, i am a survivor, and i do believe it saved my life along with two other chemo drugs can't remember them but i know i took Taxotere.
Posts.Title: Anyone heard of the drug Taxotere?

Posts.Content: I would like to know if anyone has experienced chemo brain, they are finding out in new studies that it is real, forgetting alot after chemo, i have not had chemo for over 4 years now and still somtimes can't remember things not to serious but frustrating, please someone chat with me about this subject so i'm not alone.
Posts.Title: Chemo Brain

Posts.Content: Hi Sissy, just want you to know that i am a breast cancer survivor. We never know the answer, it is always a waiting game, but what news you do have i am praying for you. I hope it is not cancer, if you ever need to chat i am their for you! Day by day, and positive is my secret to you, With lot's of prayer's for you, Katrina
Posts.Title: Going for first Biopsy

Posts.Content: hi sheila, you are so right, i really do feel a positive attitude is also the key, good luck to ted and you, and thanks for the message this link is great, because we are not alone!

Posts.Content: thanks Shelia, it makes me feel good that we can all talk about this stuff and were not alone, take care, Katrina
